title: Undercurrent: The Disappearance of Kim Wall
description:
Today on True Story, Tig and Cheryl discuss "Undercurrent," a true-crime doc from the director of "Britney Vs Spears." The doc provokes some serious discussion, but as always there are some lighter moments and tangents along the way. Don't forget-- Tig and Cheryl have a LIVE show this Wednesday-- tickets available at loopedlive.com or on our social media profile. *this episode spills beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
